title: Real-time IoT control dashboard
description: Developed a real-time IoT dashboard for remote relay control, using WebSocket (Socket.IO) for frontend-backend communication and UDP for low-latency microcontroller interactions. Implemented secure authentication, live data visualization, and error handling for reliability, bridging web apps with embedded systems for industrial automation.

title: AI-Powered Website Builder
description: Developed an AI-driven web app that automates website creation by generating structure, files, and code. Built the frontend with React.js, Tailwind CSS, and integrated AI-powered steps using Node.js. Implemented a dynamic file system and live code editor for real-time updates.

title: Cloud kitchen Management
description: Developed a web-based platform for managing cloud kitchen operations using the Evolute-IQ platform. Enabled seamless order tracking, inventory management, and customer feedback collection, reducing manual effort by 50%.

title: Library Management
description: Designed and developed a full-stack web application for managing library resources using React.js, Node.js, CSS, and MongoDB. Implemented features such as book tracking, user authentication, and digital asset management, improving operational efficiency by 30%.
